definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: A furrow, ridge or crease on a normally smooth surface.
sentences.chinese: 正常的平滑的表面上出现的皱纹，或折痕。

sentences.english: Hand clenched face loosen, crease is not obvious, and can be quickly restored.
sentences.chinese: 用手捏紧呢面松开，折痕不明显，且能迅速恢复原状。

sentences.english: Even normal gathers and folds can create value contrasts.
sentences.chinese: 即使是普通的褶裥或折痕也能形成亮度的对比。

sentences.english: In any case, the job of a pleat is to maintain that crease sown the front of your pants.
sentences.chinese: 在任何场合中，裤褶的作用是保持裤腿前面的折痕。

sentences.english: Open up a creased and folded paper texture and desaturate.
sentences.chinese: 打开一个折痕，折叠纸的质地和降低饱和度。

sentences.english: The shirt acquired the faintest of creases.
sentences.chinese: 这件衬衫上有一条很淡的折痕。

sentences.english: Creases may result in streaks in subsequent dyeing steps.
sentences.chinese: 折痕可能在以后的染色工序中产生色条。

sentences.english: Dermo creases are much deeper than wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 真皮折痕远远比皱纹更深。

sentences.english: The point is at the elbow crease on the inner side of the tendon.
sentences.chinese: 问题的关键是在肘部的肌腱上的折痕方内。

sentences.english: The point is at the elbow crease on the outer side of the tendon.
sentences.chinese: 问题的关键是在肘部的肌腱上的折痕边外。

sentences.english: There is a crease what can I do?
sentences.chinese: 有一个折痕我该怎么办？

sentences.english: In addition, some folding machine itself with the capabilities of the folds.
sentences.chinese: 此外，有的折页机本身就具有压折痕的功能。

sentences.english: Ears - Folded level with top of head, with forward edge close to cheek.
sentences.chinese: 耳朵的折痕位于头顶的水平面，前侧边缘贴近面颊。

sentences.english: This is to create the center fold.
sentences.chinese: 这是为了制作中央折痕。

sentences.english: Wider hinges also fold faster, because there is more surface area to absorb energy.
sentences.chinese: 折痕角度越大，吸热表面积越大，也可以折叠的更快。

sentences.english: Pull one pointed flap upward while pushing the side creases inward.
sentences.chinese: 当推动旁的折痕臀酢的时候，以上拉一尖的拍打。

definition: to sell at a 50% discount/to fold in two
welt seam (doubled over and sewed again from topside)
to fold the corner of a page/to dog-ear
base (of a triangle)/base line/hem line (of skirt)
